Title: Relates to the operation of vehicles when approaching bicyclists on the roadway
Summary: Relates to the operation of vehicles when approaching bicyclists on the roadway, requiring drivers to move lanes, if possible, or reduce speed.
LawCode: Amd ยง1146, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the operation of vehicles when approaching bicyclists on the roadway
